name: Trekkie
description:
A throwback to the days of the mainframe, but written for today's personal computers, Trekkie is a strategy game inspired by the text-only games of the 1970's.  Cruise the Mutara Nebula as Captain Quirk, searching for alien probes and dodging nefarious aliens.   Can you complete your mission before your ship runs out of precious energy?

This game is currently in Open Beta!  Please provide constructive comments in the Discussion Board, and I'll add you as a playtester.
